content.description: The following question is based on a chorale you will hear. The chorale consists of two four-measure phrases. It will be performed on piano.
content.question: In the closing cadence of the first phrase, which harmony is tonicized by a secondary dominant chord?

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
